item.title: Why should I attend

item.title: Convince my Hippo
item.description: HiPPO (Highest Paid Person's Opinion) is super important to getting funding to come to HAX camp. Here's some easy reasons they'll be thrilled to send you:Web components can be used in any Content Man

item.title: Where?
item.description: State College Pennsylvania. It's in the middle of the state next to a giant university. There's an airport, cows, and most importantly, web components discussions to be had and new friends to make.

item.title: Unconference?

item.title: CoC
item.description: Code of Conduct.Don't troll people by showing VDOM and everything will be cool.No but seriously...
